text: Masour Ousmane Dembélé (born May 15, 1997) is a French football player. Dembélé plays as a forward for Paris Saint-Germain and the France national team. He is known for being both footed and his explosiveness, speed and finishing. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== Appearances and goals by club, season and competition Club Season League Cup Europe Other Total Division Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Rennes II 2014–15 CFA 18 13 — — — 18 13 2015–16 CFA 4 0 — — — 4 0 Total 22 13 — — — 22 13 Rennes 2015–16 Ligue 1 26 12 2 0 — 1 0 29 12 Borussia Dortmund 2016–17 Bundesliga 32 6 6 2 10 2 1 0 49 10 2017–18 Bundesliga 0 0 0 0 0 0 1 0 1 0 Total 32 6 6 2 10 2 2 0 50 10 Barcelona 2017–18 La Liga 17 3 3 0 3 1 — 23 4 2018–19 La Liga 29 8 4 2 8 3 1 1 42 14 2019–20 La Liga 5 1 0 0 4 0 0 0 9 1 2020–21 La Liga 30 6 6 2 6 3 2 0 44 11 2021–22 La Liga 21 1 1 1 9 0 1 0 32 2 2022–23 La Liga 25 5 2 2 6 1 2 0 35 8 Total 127 24 16 7 36 8 6 1 185 40 Paris Saint-Germain 2023–24 Ligue 1 11 0 0 0 4 0 0 0 15 0 Career total 218 55 24 9 50 10 9 1 301 75 ===International=== Appearances and goals by national team and year National team Year Apps Goals France 2016 3 0 2017 4 1 2018 14 1 2021 6 2 2022 8 0 2023 6 1 Total 41 5 :Scores and results list France's goal tally first, score column indicates score after each Dembélé goal.
